plot: Stewart and Miguel break up when Stewart can't deal with Miguel's being HIV positive. To assuage his guilt, Stewart gets Miguel a dog which leads to the unexpected.
title: Miguel, Ma Belle
plot_es: Stewart and Miguel break up when Stewart can't deal with Miguel's being HIV positive. To assuage his guilt, Stewart gets Miguel a dog which leads to the unexpected.
plot_en: Stewart and Miguel break up when Stewart can't deal with Miguel's being HIV positive. To assuage his guilt, Stewart gets Miguel a dog which leads to the unexpected.
